m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- China Development Bank Finances LDK-SPI Solar International Expansion Plans January 6th, 2012 by Andrew   Photo courtesy LDK Solar Roseville, California-based SPI Solar, a US subsidiary of China’s LDK Solar, today announced it has secured $44 million in construction financing from China Development Bank (CDB) to carry out solar photovoltaic (PV) projects with KDC Solar in New Jersey.
